resources.string: Ligtas is a Health Monitoring Mobile Application developed by the student researchers of Philippine State College of Aeronautics (PHILSCA) - Villamor Campus that aims to help the aviation community management to manage and monitor the user\'s health information.

POLICY ON CONSENSUAL DATA COLLECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

 The System, accessible on desktop and mobile devices, intends to assist researchers in more correctly and efficiently managing, analyzing, and monitoring individual information. We guarantee user security and data privacy. As a result, we will only need what the System actually needs to work. If someone chooses to use our Service, they will be informed of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information via this page.


WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT FROM THE USER 

 Without your permission, we never collect any personal information. The Data Privacy Act of 2012, or Republic Act 10173, will be used to manage, preserve, and protect the personal information that the System collects. The System will only gather, use, or disclose your personal information in accordance with this policy and the Data Privacy Act of 2012. We only gather personal information for specific, legitimate objectives that have been decided upon and announced before or as soon as is practically possible after collection, which will only be processed later in a manner consistent with those declared, specific, and legitimate goals.


These are the following data needed upon using the Application:
 1.Type of User
 2.Name
 3.Full Address
 4.Email
 5.Gender
 6.Birthdate
 7.Mobile Number
 8.Password
 9.Health Status
 10.Comorbidity


COOKIES 

 Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as unique anonymous identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites you visit and stored on your device's internal memory. This Service does not use these \“cookies\” explicitly. However, the app may use third-party code and libraries that use \“cookies\” to collect information and improve their services. You can either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

 This data would only be retained and used specifically for the purpose of Web Application.


HOW WE SECURE YOUR INFORMATION 

 We implement reasonable and appropriate physical, technical, and organizational measures to prevent your information's loss, destruction, misuse, or alteration. While there is no guarantee that information sent over the internet is fully secured, we keep and protect your information using a secured server behind a firewall, encryption, and security controls. Your Personal Data and Collected Data are protected by technical, organizational, and physical safeguards that keep them safe against destruction, unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, fraudulent usage, and/or any other illegal processing, as well as any natural and man-made hazards.
